CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE\n// SOFTWARE.\n//\n\npragma solidity 0.8.27;\n\nimport { Ownable } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol\";\nimport { ERC20 } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol\";\nimport { IERC20 } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\nimport { IERC20Permit, ERC20Permit } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Permit.sol\";\nimport { ReentrancyGuard } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol\";\nimport { Pausable } from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Pausable.sol\";\nimport { ICarbonCoin } from \"./interface/ICarbonCoin.sol\";\nimport { ICarbonCoinLauncher } from \"./interface/ICarbonCoinLauncher.sol\";\nimport { ICarbonCoinConfig } from \"./interface/ICarbonCoinConfig.sol\";\nimport { ICarbonCoinDex } from \"./interface/ICarbonCoinDex.sol\";\nimport { ICarbonCoinProtection } from \"./interface/ICarbonCoinProtection.sol\";\n\ncontract CarbonCoin is ICarbonCoin, ERC20, ERC20Permit, ReentrancyGuard, Pausable {\n    // Bonding curve parameters (immutable after deployment)\n    uint256 public immutable VIRTUAL_USDC;\n    uint256 public immutable VIRTUAL_TOKENS;\n    uint256 public immutable CREATOR_RESERVE_SUPPLY;\n    uint256 public immutable LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY;\n    uint256 public immutable CURVE_SUPPLY;\n    uint256 public immutable MAX_SUPPLY;\n    uint256 public immutable GRADUATION_THRESHOLD;\n\n    // State variables\n    uint256 public realUsdcReserves;\n    uint256 public realTokenSupply;\n    uint256 public immutable launchTime;\n    address public immutable creator;\n    address public immutable config;\n    address public immutable launcher;\n    address public immutable protection;\n    address internal controller;\n    bool public hasGraduated;\n\n    // USDC token integration\n    IERC20 public immutable USDC;\n\n    // Emergency withdrawal protection\n    uint256 public lastGraduationAttempt;\n    uint256 public constant GRADUATION_COOLDOWN = 1 hours;\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Constructor for the CarbonCoinUSDC contract.\n     * @dev Initializes the token with its name, symbol, creator, USDC address, and Somnia Exchange router.\n     * It also whitelists the creator and the launcher contract to bypass certain restrictions.\n     * @param name The name of the token.\n     * @param symbol The symbol of the token.\n     * @param _creator The address of the token creator.\n     * @param _usdc The address of the USDC token contract.\n     * @param _controller The address of the controller contract.\n     * @param _config The address of the token configuration contract.\n     * @param _protection The address of the token protection contract.\n     * @param bondingCurveConfig The bonding curve parameters.\n     */\n    constructor(\n        string memory name,\n        string memory symbol,\n        address _creator,\n        address _usdc,\n        address _controller,\n        address _config,\n        address _protection,\n        BondingCurveConfig memory bondingCurveConfig\n    ) ERC20(name, symbol) ERC20Permit(name) {\n        // Validate inputs\n        require(_creator != address(0), \"Invalid creator\");\n        require(_usdc != address(0), \"Invalid USDC address\");\n        require(_config != address(0), \"Invalid config\");\n        require(_protection != address(0), \"Invalid protection\");\n\n        creator = _creator;\n        launcher = msg.sender;\n        config = _config;\n        protection = _protection;\n        USDC = IERC20(_usdc);\n        launchTime = block.timestamp;\n        controller = _controller;\n\n        // Set bonding curve config (immutable)\n        VIRTUAL_USDC = bondingCurveConfig.virtualUsdc;\n        VIRTUAL_TOKENS = bondingCurveConfig.virtualTokens;\n        CREATOR_RESERVE_SUPPLY = bondingCurveConfig.creatorReserve;\n        LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY = bondingCurveConfig.liquiditySupply;\n        CURVE_SUPPLY = bondingCurveConfig.curveSupply;\n        MAX_SUPPLY = bondingCurveConfig.maxSupply;\n        GRADUATION_THRESHOLD = bondingCurveConfig.graduationThreshold;\n\n        // Mint creator reserve\n        if (CREATOR_RESERVE_SUPPLY > 0) {\n            _mint(_creator, CREATOR_RESERVE_SUPPLY);\n            emit CreatorReserveMinted(_creator, CREATOR_RESERVE_SUPPLY, block.timestamp);\n        }\n\n        // Emit deployment event for indexing\n        emit TokenDeployed(\n            address(this),\n            creator,\n            name,\n            symbol,\n            MAX_SUPPLY,\n            GRADUATION_THRESHOLD,\n            block.timestamp\n        );\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Get total supply including creator reserve\n     */\n    function getTotalMaxSupply() external view returns (uint256) {\n        return MAX_SUPPLY;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Get bonding curve supply (excludes creator reserve)\n     */\n    function getBondingCurveMaxSupply() external view returns (uint256) {\n        return CURVE_SUPPLY;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Get the liquidity supply for the bonding curve.\n     * @dev This determines how much of the total supply is allocated to liquidity vs creator reserve.\n     * @return The liquidity supply amount.\n     */\n    function getLiquiditySupply() external view returns (uint256) {\n        return LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Get the current token price in USDC.\n     * @dev Calculates the price based on the bonding curve's virtual and real reserves.\n     * @return The current price of one token in USDC (with 6 decimals for USDC).\n     */\n    function getCurrentPrice() public view returns (uint256) {\n        uint256 totalUsdc = VIRTUAL_USDC + realUsdcReserves;\n        uint256 totalTokens = VIRTUAL_TOKENS - realTokenSupply;\n        // totalUsdc is 6 decimals, totalTokens is 18 decimals\n        // To get price in USDC (6 decimals) per token, scale up by 10**18\n        return (totalUsdc * 10**18) / totalTokens;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     *\n     * @return _maxTradeSize\n     * @return _maxSellPercentage\n     * @return _whaleThreshold\n     * @return _whaleDelay\n     * @return currentMaxSellTokens\n     */\n    function getTradeLimits() external view returns (\n        uint256 _maxTradeSize,\n        uint256 _maxSellPercentage,\n        uint256 _whaleThreshold,\n        uint256 _whaleDelay,\n        uint256 currentMaxSellTokens\n    ) {\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.WhaleLimitConfig memory whaleConfig = _getWhaleLimitConfig();\n        return (\n            whaleConfig.maxTradeSize,\n            whaleConfig.maxSellPercentage,\n            whaleConfig.whaleThreshold,\n            whaleConfig.whaleDelay,\n            (realTokenSupply * whaleConfig.maxSellPercentage) / 10000\n        );\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Calculate the amount of tokens received for a given USDC input.\n     * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.\n     * @param usdcIn The amount of USDC to be spent.\n     * @return The amount of tokens that will be received.\n     */\n    function calculateTokensOut(uint256 usdcIn) public view returns (uint256) {\n        if (usdcIn == 0) return 0;\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.FeeConfig memory feeConfig = _getFeeConfig();\n        uint256 usdcAfterFee = (usdcIn * (10000 - feeConfig.buyFee)) / 10000;\n\n        uint256 k = (VIRTUAL_USDC + realUsdcReserves) * (VIRTUAL_TOKENS - realTokenSupply);\n        uint256 newTotalUsdc = VIRTUAL_USDC + realUsdcReserves + usdcAfterFee;\n        uint256 newTotalTokens = k / newTotalUsdc;\n        uint256 newRealSupply = VIRTUAL_TOKENS - newTotalTokens;\n\n        return newRealSupply - realTokenSupply;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC needed to buy a specific amount of tokens.\n     * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.\n     * @param tokensOut The desired amount of tokens.\n     * @return The amount of USDC required to purchase the specified tokens.\n     */\n    function calculateUsdcIn(uint256 tokensOut) public view returns (uint256) {\n        if (tokensOut == 0) return 0;\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.FeeConfig memory feeConfig = _getFeeConfig();\n\n        uint256 k = (VIRTUAL_USDC + realUsdcReserves) * (VIRTUAL_TOKENS - realTokenSupply);\n        uint256 newRealSupply = realTokenSupply + tokensOut;\n        uint256 newTotalTokens = VIRTUAL_TOKENS - newRealSupply;\n        uint256 newTotalUsdc = k / newTotalTokens;\n        uint256 newUsdcReserves = newTotalUsdc - VIRTUAL_USDC;\n        uint256 usdcNeeded = newUsdcReserves - realUsdcReserves;\n\n        return (usdcNeeded * 10000) / (10000 - feeConfig.buyFee);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.\n     * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.\n     * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to be sold.\n     * @return The amount of USDC that will be received.\n     */\n    function calculateUsdcOut(uint256 tokensIn) public view returns (uint256) {\n        (uint256 usdcOut, ) = calculateUsdcOutWithFee(tokensIn);\n        return usdcOut;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.\n     * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.\n     * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to be sold.\n     * @return The amount of USDC that will be received.\n     * @return The amount of fee that will be taken.\n     */\n    function calculateUsdcOutWithFee(uint256 tokensIn) public view returns (uint256, uint256) {\n        if (tokensIn == 0) return (0, 0);\n        if (tokensIn > realTokenSupply) return (0, 0);\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.FeeConfig memory feeConfig = _getFeeConfig();\n\n        uint256 k = (VIRTUAL_USDC + realUsdcReserves) * (VIRTUAL_TOKENS - realTokenSupply);\n        uint256 newRealSupply = realTokenSupply - tokensIn;\n        uint256 newTotalTokens = VIRTUAL_TOKENS - newRealSupply;\n        uint256 newTotalUsdc = k / newTotalTokens;\n        uint256 newUsdcReserves = newTotalUsdc - VIRTUAL_USDC;\n        uint256 usdcOut = realUsdcReserves - newUsdcReserves;\n        uint256 usdcAmount = (usdcOut * (10000 - feeConfig.sellFee)) / 10000;\n        uint256 feeAmount = usdcOut - usdcAmount;\n        return (usdcAmount, feeAmount);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC (standard approval required).\n     * @dev Alternative to buyWithPermit for wallets that don't support permit or for pre-approved USDC.\n     * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC to spend.\n     * @param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n     */\n    function buy(uint256 usdcAmount, uint256 minTokensOut) external nonReentrant whenNotPaused {\n        // Protection checks\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkAntiBotProtection(address(this), msg.sender, usdcAmount, true);\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkCircuitBreaker(address(this));\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkTradeSizeLimit(address(this), msg.sender, usdcAmount);\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.AntiBotConfig memory botConfig = _getAntiBotConfig();\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        if (usdcAmount < botConfig.minBuyAmount) revert InvalidAmount();\n\n        require(USDC.transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), usdcAmount), \"USDC transfer failed\");\n\n        // Check whale intent\n        (bool requiresIntent, bool canProceed) = ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkWhaleIntent(\n            address(this),\n            msg.sender,\n            usdcAmount,\n            true\n        );\n\n        if (requiresIntent && !canProceed) {\n            revert WhaleIntentRequired();\n        }\n\n        _executeBuy(msg.sender, usdcAmount, minTokensOut);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC using permit (gasless signature).\n     * @dev This is the standard buy function where users pay their own gas.\n     * Uses EIP-2612 permit to avoid separate approval transaction.\n     * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC to spend.\n     * @param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n     * @param deadline The permit signature deadline.\n     * @param v The recovery byte of the signature.\n     * @param r Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n     * @param s Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n     */\n    function buyWithPermit(\n        uint256 usdcAmount,\n        uint256 minTokensOut,\n        uint256 deadline,\n        uint8 v,\n        bytes32 r,\n        bytes32 s\n    ) external nonReentrant whenNotPaused {\n        // Protection checks\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkAntiBotProtection(address(this), msg.sender, usdcAmount, true);\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkCircuitBreaker(address(this));\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkTradeSizeLimit(address(this), msg.sender, usdcAmount);\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.AntiBotConfig memory botConfig = _getAntiBotConfig();\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        if (usdcAmount < botConfig.minBuyAmount) revert InvalidAmount();\n\n        // Execute permit\n        IERC20Permit(address(USDC)).permit(msg.sender, address(this), usdcAmount, deadline, v, r, s);\n        require(USDC.transferFrom(msg.sender, address(this), usdcAmount), \"USDC transfer failed\");\n\n        // Check whale intent\n        (bool requiresIntent, bool canProceed) = ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkWhaleIntent(\n            address(this),\n            msg.sender,\n            usdcAmount,\n            true\n        );\n\n        if (requiresIntent && !canProceed) {\n            revert WhaleIntentRequired();\n        }\n\n        _executeBuy(msg.sender, usdcAmount, minTokensOut);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice\n     * @dev\n     * @param receiver The address of the user receiving the tokens.\n     * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC to spend.\n     * @ param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n     * @param deadline The permit signature deadline.\n     * @param v The recovery byte of the signature.\n     * @param r Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n     * @param s Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n     */\n    function buyOnBehalf(\n        address receiver,\n        uint256 usdcAmount,\n        uint256 minTokensOut,\n        uint256 deadline,\n        uint8 v,\n        bytes32 r,\n        bytes32 s\n    ) external nonReentrant whenNotPaused onlyController {\n        // Protection checks\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkAntiBotProtection(address(this), receiver, usdcAmount, true);\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkCircuitBreaker(address(this));\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkTradeSizeLimit(address(this), receiver, usdcAmount);\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.AntiBotConfig memory botConfig = _getAntiBotConfig();\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        if (usdcAmount < botConfig.minBuyAmount) revert InvalidAmount();\n\n        // Execute permit & transfer\n        IERC20Permit(address(USDC)).permit(receiver, address(this), usdcAmount, deadline, v, r, s);\n        require(USDC.transferFrom(receiver, address(this), usdcAmount), \"USDC transfer failed\");\n\n        // Check whale intent\n        (bool requiresIntent, bool canProceed) = ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkWhaleIntent(\n            address(this),\n            receiver,\n            usdcAmount,\n            true\n        );\n\n        if (requiresIntent && !canProceed) {\n            revert WhaleIntentRequired();\n        }\n\n        _executeBuy(receiver, usdcAmount, minTokensOut); // todo: deploy line by line..\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Internal function to execute a token purchase.\n     * @dev This function handles the core logic of a buy transaction.\n     * @param buyer The address of the user purchasing tokens.\n     * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC being spent.\n     * @param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n     */\n    function _executeBuy(address buyer, uint256 usdcAmount, uint256 minTokensOut) internal {\n        uint256 priceBefore = getCurrentPrice();\n        uint256 tokensOut = calculateTokensOut(usdcAmount);\n\n        if (tokensOut < minTokensOut) revert SlippageTooHigh();\n        if (realTokenSupply + tokensOut > CURVE_SUPPLY) revert ExceedsMaxSupply();\n\n        ICarbonCoinConfig.FeeConfig memory feeConfig = _getFeeConfig();\n\n        uint256 usdcAfterFee = (usdcAmount * (10000 - feeConfig.buyFee)) / 10000;\n        uint256 fee = usdcAmount - usdcAfterFee;\n\n        realUsdcReserves += usdcAfterFee;\n        realTokenSupply += tokensOut;\n\n        uint256 priceAfter = getCurrentPrice();\n\n        // Check price impact through protection contract\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkPriceImpact(\n            address(this),\n            buyer,\n            priceBefore,\n            priceAfter,\n            usdcAmount,\n            true\n        );\n\n        // Track volatility\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).trackVolatility(address(this), priceAfter, priceBefore);\n        ICarbonCoinLauncher(launcher).trackCoinBuy(\n          address(this),\n          buyer,\n          usdcAmount,\n          fee,\n          tokensOut\n        );\n\n        _mint(buyer, tokensOut);\n\n        if (fee > 0) {\n            require(USDC.transfer(launcher, fee), \"Fee transfer failed\");\n        }\n\n        emit TokensPurchased(\n            buyer,\n            usdcAmount,\n            tokensOut,\n            priceAfter,\n            realUsdcReserves,\n            realTokenSupply,\n            block.timestamp\n        );\n\n        emit PriceUpdate(priceAfter, realUsdcReserves, realTokenSupply, block.timestamp);\n\n        if (realUsdcReserves >= GRADUATION_THRESHOLD) {\n            _graduate();\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Allows a user to sell tokens for USDC.\n     * @dev This function is the main entry point for selling tokens.\n     * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to sell.\n     * @param minUsdcOut The minimum amount of USDC the user is willing to accept.\n     */\n    function sell(uint256 tokensIn, uint256 minUsdcOut) external nonReentrant whenNotPaused {\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkCircuitBreaker(address(this));\n\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        if (tokensIn == 0) revert InvalidAmount();\n        if (balanceOf(msg.sender) < tokensIn) revert InvalidAmount();\n\n        (uint256 usdcOut, uint256 feeAmount) = calculateUsdcOutWithFee(tokensIn);\n\n        // Check whale intent\n        (bool requiresIntent, bool canProceed) = ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkWhaleIntent(\n            address(this),\n            msg.sender,\n            usdcOut + feeAmount,\n            false\n        );\n\n        if (requiresIntent && !canProceed) {\n            revert WhaleIntentRequired();\n        }\n\n        _executeSell(msg.sender, tokensIn, minUsdcOut, usdcOut, feeAmount);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Internal function to execute a token sale.\n     * @dev This function handles the core logic of a sell transaction.\n     * @param seller The address of the user selling tokens.\n     * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens being sold.\n     * @param minUsdcOut The minimum amount of USDC the user is willing to accept.\n     * @param usdcOut The calculated amount of USDC to be received.\n     */\n    function _executeSell(address seller, uint256 tokensIn, uint256 minUsdcOut, uint256 usdcOut, uint256 fee) internal {\n        if (usdcOut < minUsdcOut) revert SlippageTooHigh();\n        if (usdcOut + fee > realUsdcReserves) revert InsufficientLiquidity();\n\n        uint256 priceBefore = getCurrentPrice();\n        realUsdcReserves -= usdcOut + fee;\n        realTokenSupply -= tokensIn;\n\n        uint256 priceAfter = getCurrentPrice();\n\n        // Check price impact\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).checkPriceImpact(\n            address(this),\n            seller,\n            priceBefore,\n            priceAfter,\n            usdcOut,\n            false\n        );\n\n        // Track volatility\n        ICarbonCoinProtection(protection).trackVolatility(address(this), priceAfter, priceBefore);\n        ICarbonCoinLauncher(launcher).trackCoinSell(\n          address(this),\n          seller,\n          tokensIn,\n          fee,\n          usdcOut\n        );\n\n        _burn(seller, tokensIn);\n\n        require(USDC.transfer(seller, usdcOut), \"USDC transfer failed\");\n\n        if (fee > 0) {\n            require(USDC.transfer(launcher, fee), \"Fee transfer failed\");\n        }\n\n        emit TokensSold(\n            seller,\n            tokensIn,\n            usdcOut,\n            priceAfter,\n            realUsdcReserves,\n            realTokenSupply,\n            block.timestamp\n        );\n\n        emit PriceUpdate(priceAfter, realUsdcReserves, realTokenSupply, block.timestamp);\n    }\n\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Graduate to Somnia Exchange with USDC/Token pair.\n     * @dev Creates a USDC/Token liquidity pool instead of ETH/Token.\n     */\n    function _graduate() internal {\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n\n        if (block.timestamp < lastGraduationAttempt + GRADUATION_COOLDOWN) {\n            revert GraduationCooldownActive();\n        }\n        lastGraduationAttempt = block.timestamp;\n\n        hasGraduated = true;\n\n        _mint(address(this), LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY);\n\n        address dexAddress = ICarbonCoinConfig(config).getCarbonCoinDex();\n\n        _approve(address(this), dexAddress, LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY);\n        USDC.approve(dexAddress, realUsdcReserves);\n\n        (uint256 amountA, uint256 amountB, uint256 liquidity, uint256 lpTokenId) = ICarbonCoinDex(dexAddress)\n            .deployLiquidity(creator, address(this), LIQUIDITY_SUPPLY, realUsdcReserves);\n\n        ICarbonCoinLauncher(launcher).markTokenGraduated(address(this));\n\n        emit Graduated(\n            address(this),\n            lpTokenId,\n            amountB,\n            amountA,\n            getCurrentPrice(),\n            block.timestamp\n        );\n\n        emit LiquiditySnapshot(amountA, amountB, liquidity, block.timestamp);\n    }\n\n    // Manual graduation with cooldown (emergency only)\n    function forceGraduate() external onlyAuthorized {\n        if (realUsdcReserves < GRADUATION_THRESHOLD) revert InsufficientLiquidity();\n        _graduate();\n    }\n\n    // Emergency pause (can only be called before graduation)\n    function pause() external onlyAuthorized {\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        _pause();\n        emit TradingPaused(block.timestamp);\n    }\n\n    function unpause() external onlyAuthorized {\n        _unpause();\n        emit TradingUnpaused(block.timestamp);\n    }\n\n    // Emergency withdrawal (only if something goes wrong before graduation)\n    function emergencyWithdraw() external onlyAuthorized {\n        if (hasGraduated) revert AlreadyGraduated();\n        require(paused(), \"Must be paused first\");\n\n        uint256 balance = USDC.balanceOf(address(this));\n        require(USDC.transfer(launcher, balance), \"Withdrawal failed\");\n\n        emit EmergencyWithdraw(launcher, balance, block.timestamp);\n        emit LiquiditySnapshot(0, 0, 0, block.timestamp);\n    }\n\n    function getReserves() external view returns (\n        uint256 usdcReserves,\n        uint256 tokenSupply,\n        uint256 virtualUsdc,\n        uint256 virtualTokens\n    ) {\n        return (realUsdcReserves, realTokenSupply, VIRTUAL_USDC, VIRTUAL_TOKENS);\n    }\n\n    function updateController(address newController) external onlyAuthorized {\n      require(newController != address(0), \"Invalid controller\");\n      controller = newController;\n      emit ControllerUpdated(newController);\n    }\n\n    function _owner() internal view returns (address) {\n      return Ownable(config).owner();\n    }\n\n    function _getFeeConfig() internal view returns (ICarbonCoinConfig.FeeConfig memory) {\n      return ICarbonCoinConfig(config).getFeeConfig();\n    }\n\n    function _getAntiBotConfig() internal view returns (ICarbonCoinConfig.AntiBotConfig memory) {\n      return ICarbonCoinConfig(config).getAntiBotConfig();\n    }\n\n    function _getWhaleLimitConfig() internal view returns (ICarbonCoinConfig.WhaleLimitConfig memory) {\n      return ICarbonCoinConfig(config).getWhaleLimitConfig();\n    }\n\n    modifier onlyAuthorized() {\n        if (msg.sender != launcher && msg.sender != _owner() && msg.sender != creator) revert Unauthorized();\n        _;\n    }\n\n    modifier onlyController() {\n        if (msg.sender != controller) revert Unauthorized();\n        _;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @notice Override _update to prevent creator from selling before graduation\n     * @dev This hook is called before any token transfer\n     */\n    function _update(address from, address to, uint256 amount) internal virtual override {\n        // Prevent creator from selling/transferring before graduation\n        // Allow minting (from == address(0)) and burning (to == address(0))\n        if (from == creator && to != address(0) && !hasGraduated) {\n            revert CreatorCannotSellBeforeGraduation();\n        }\n\n        super._update(from, to, amount);\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x52310655cf7a8f90fca024e436017d53087c949a9e611556caadda1c3bc6baff","license":"MIT"},"contracts/interface/ICarbonCoin.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\n\n// CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE\n// SOFTWARE.\n//\n\npragma solidity 0.8.27;\n\ninterface ICarbonCoin {\n  struct BondingCurveConfig {\n    uint256 virtualUsdc;\n    uint256 virtualTokens;\n    uint256 creatorReserve;\n    uint256 liquiditySupply;\n    uint256 curveSupply;\n    uint256 maxSupply;\n    uint256 graduationThreshold;\n  }\n\n  // Trading events\n  event TokensPurchased(\n    address indexed buyer,\n    uint256 usdcAmount,\n    uint256 tokensOut,\n    uint256 newPrice,\n    uint256 realUsdcReserves,\n    uint256 realTokenSupply,\n    uint256 timestamp\n  );\n  event TokensSold(\n    address indexed seller,\n    uint256 tokensIn,\n    uint256 usdcOut,\n    uint256 newPrice,\n    uint256 realUsdcReserves,\n    uint256 realTokenSupply,\n    uint256 timestamp\n  );\n\n  // Lifecycle events\n  event TokenDeployed(\n    address indexed token,\n    address indexed creator,\n    string name,\n    string symbol,\n    uint256 maxSupply,\n    uint256 graduationThreshold,\n    uint256 timestamp\n  );\n  event Graduated(\n    address indexed token,\n    uint256 lpTokenId,\n    uint256 liquidityTokens,\n    uint256 liquidityUsdc,\n    uint256 finalPrice,\n    uint256 timestamp\n  );\n\n  // Admin events\n  event EmergencyWithdraw(address indexed to, uint256 amount, uint256 timestamp);\n  event TradingPaused(uint256 timestamp);\n  event TradingUnpaused(uint256 timestamp);\n  event ControllerUpdated(address indexed newController);\n\n  // State tracking events\n  event PriceUpdate(uint256 price, uint256 usdcReserves, uint256 tokenSupply, uint256 timestamp);\n  event LiquiditySnapshot(uint256 usdcSupply, uint256 tokenSupply, uint256 liquidity, uint256 timestamp);\n  event CreatorReserveMinted(address indexed creator, uint256 amount, uint256 timestamp);\n\n  error Unauthorized();\n  error InvalidAmount();\n  error ExceedsMaxSupply();\n  error SlippageTooHigh();\n  error InsufficientLiquidity();\n  error AlreadyGraduated();\n  error NotGraduated();\n  error GraduationCooldownActive();\n  error WhaleIntentRequired();\n  error CreatorCannotSellBeforeGraduation();\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Get total supply including creator reserve\n   */\n  function getTotalMaxSupply() external view returns (uint256);\n  /**\n   * @notice Get bonding curve supply (excludes creator reserve)\n   */\n  function getBondingCurveMaxSupply() external view returns (uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Get the current token price in USDC.\n   * @dev Calculates the price based on the bonding curve's virtual and real reserves.\n   * @return The current price of one token in USDC (with 6 decimals for USDC).\n   */\n  function getCurrentPrice() external view returns (uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Get the liquidity supply for the bonding curve.\n   * @dev This determines how much of the total supply is allocated to liquidity vs creator reserve.\n   * @return _maxTradeSize\n   * @return _maxSellPercentage\n   * @return _whaleThreshold\n   * @return _whaleDelay\n   * @return currentMaxSellTokens\n   */\n  function getTradeLimits() external view returns (\n    uint256 _maxTradeSize,\n    uint256 _maxSellPercentage,\n    uint256 _whaleThreshold,\n    uint256 _whaleDelay,\n    uint256 currentMaxSellTokens\n  );\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Calculate the amount of tokens received for a given USDC input.\n   * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.\n   * @param usdcIn The amount of USDC to be spent.\n   * @return The amount of tokens that will be received.\n   */\n  function calculateTokensOut(uint256 usdcIn) external view returns (uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC needed to buy a specific amount of tokens.\n   * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.\n   * @param tokensOut The desired amount of tokens.\n   * @return The amount of USDC required to purchase the specified tokens.\n   */\n  function calculateUsdcIn(uint256 tokensOut) external view returns (uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.\n   * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.\n   * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to be sold.\n   * @return The amount of USDC that will be received.\n   */\n  function calculateUsdcOut(uint256 tokensIn) external view returns (uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.\n   * @dev The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.\n   * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to be sold.\n   * @return The amount of USDC that will be received.\n   * @return The amount of fee that will be taken.\n   */\n  function calculateUsdcOutWithFee(uint256 tokensIn) external view returns (uint256, uint256);\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC using permit (gasless signature).\n   * @dev This is the standard buy function where users pay their own gas.\n   * Uses EIP-2612 permit to avoid separate approval transaction.\n   * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC to spend.\n   * @param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n   * @param deadline The permit signature deadline.\n   * @param v The recovery byte of the signature.\n   * @param r Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n   * @param s Half of the ECDSA signature pair.\n   */\n  function buyWithPermit(\n    uint256 usdcAmount,\n    uint256 minTokensOut,\n    uint256 deadline,\n    uint8 v,\n    bytes32 r,\n    bytes32 s\n  ) external;\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC (standard approval required).\n   * @dev Alternative to buyWithPermit for wallets that don't support permit or for pre-approved USDC.\n   * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC to spend.\n   * @param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.\n   */\n  function buy(uint256 usdcAmount, uint256 minTokensOut) external;\n\n  function buyOnBehalf(\n        address receiver,\n        uint256 usdcAmount,\n        uint256 minTokensOut,\n        uint256 deadline,\n        uint8 v,\n        bytes32 r,\n        bytes32 s\n    ) external;\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Allows a user to sell tokens for USDC.\n   * @dev This function is the main entry point for selling tokens.\n   * @param tokensIn The amount of tokens to sell.\n   * @param minUsdcOut The minimum amount of USDC the user is willing to accept.\n   */\n  function sell(uint256 tokensIn, uint256 minUsdcOut) external;\n\n  function getReserves() external view returns (\n    uint256 usdcReserves,\n    uint256 tokenSupply,\n    uint256 virtualUsdc,\n    uint256 virtualTokens\n  );\n}\n","keccak256":"0x6b4deff53d1eaaeaff0809212a56e2074f15775dbb6f37a3cafcc9701d984874","license":"MIT"},"contracts/interface/ICarbonCoinConfig.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\n\n// sellFee;\n    uint256 maxFee;\n  }\n\n  struct AntiBotConfig {\n    uint256 antiBotDuration;\n    uint256 maxBuyAmountEarly;\n    uint256 maxWalletPercentage;\n    uint256 cooldownPeriod;\n    uint256 getCarbonCoinDex() external view returns (address);\n  function getFeeConfig() external view returns (FeeConfig memory);\n  function getAntiBotConfig() external view returns (AntiBotConfig memory);\n  function getCircuitBreakerConfig() external view returns (CircuitBreakerConfig memory);\n  function getWhaleLimitConfig() external view returns (WhaleLimitConfig @param tokenAmount The amount of tokens added to liquidity\n   * @param usdcAmount The amount of USDC added to liquidity\n   * @param liquidity The amount of LP tokens minted\n   * @param timestamp */\n  event RouterUpdated(address indexed newRouter, uint256 timestamp);\n\n  error Unauthorized();\n\n  /**\n   * @notice Deploy Liquidity to Somnia Exchange with USDC/Token pair.\n   * @dev Creates  struct TokenInfo {\n    address tokenAddress;\n    address creator;\n    uint256 createdAt;\n    bool graduated;\n    string name;\n    string symbol;\n  }\n\n  event TokenCreated(\n    address        uint256 timestamp;\n    }\n\n    struct WhaleIntent {\n        uint256 amount;\n        uint256 intentTime;\n        bool isBuy;\n        bool executed;\n    }\n\n    struct TokenProtectionState {\n        uint256 launchTime;\n        uint256 circuitBreakerTriggeredAt;\n        uint256 volatilityMoveCount;\n        uint256 lastVolatilityReset;\n        PriceSnapshot[] recentPrices;\n    }\n\n    // Events\n    event BotDetected(address indexed token, address indexed user, string reason, uint256 timestamp);\n    event AddressBlacklisted(address indexed token, address indexed user, bool blacklisted, uint256 timestamp);\n    event AddressWhitelisted(address indexed token, address indexed user, bool whitelisted, uint256 timestamp);\n    event ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

ERC20InsufficientAllowance(address,uint2.details: Indicates a failure with the `spender`s `allowance`. Used in transfers.

params.allowance: Amount of tokens a `spender` is allowed to operate with.
params.needed: Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.
params.spender: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

ERC20InsufficientBalance(address,uint256.details: Indicates an error related to the current `balance` of a `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.balance: Current balance for the interacting account.
params.needed: Minimum amount required to perform a transfer.
params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC20InvalidApprover(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `approver` of a token to be approved. Used in approvals.

ERC20InvalidReceiver(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `receiver`. Used in transfers.

params.receiver: Address to which tokens are being transferred.

ERC20InvalidSender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the token `sender`. Used in transfers.

params.sender: Address whose tokens are being transferred.

ERC20InvalidSpender(address).details: Indicates a failure with the `spender` to be approved. Used in approvals.

params.spender: Address that may be allowed to operate on tokens without being their owner.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

InvalidAccountNonce(address,uint256).details: The nonce used for an `account` is not the expected current nonce.

Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to another (`to`). Note that `value` may be zero.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signature for {permit}, as defined by {EIP712}.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `value` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the value of tokens owned by `account`.

buy(uint256,uint256).details: Alternative to buyWithPermit for wallets that don't support permit or for pre-approved USDC.

params.minTokensOut: The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.
params.usdcAmount: The amount of USDC to spend.

params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.receiver: The address of the user receiving the tokens.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.usdcAmount: The amount of USDC to spend. param minTokensOut The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

buyWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: This is the standard buy function where users pay their own gas. Uses EIP-2612 permit to avoid separate approval transaction.

params.minTokensOut: The minimum number of tokens the user is willing to accept.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.usdcAmount: The amount of USDC to spend.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

calculateTokensOut(uint256).details: The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.

params.usdcIn: The amount of USDC to be spent.

returns._0: The amount of tokens that will be received.

calculateUsdcIn(uint256).details: The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the buy fee.

returns._0: The amount of USDC required to purchase the specified tokens.

calculateUsdcOut(uint256).details: The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.

params.tokensIn: The amount of tokens to be sold.

returns._0: The amount of USDC that will be received.

calculateUsdcOutWithFee(uint256).details: The calculation is based on the bonding curve formula and includes the sell fee.

params.tokensIn: The amount of tokens to be sold.

returns._0: The amount of USDC that will be received.
returns._1: The amount of fee that will be taken.

constructor.details: Initializes the token with its name, symbol, creator, USDC address, and Somnia Exchange router. It also whitelists the creator and the launcher contract to bypass certain restrictions.

params._config: The address of the token configuration contract.
params._controller: The address of the controller contract.
params._creator: The address of the token creator.
params._protection: The address of the token protection contract.
params._usdc: The address of the USDC token contract.
params.name: The name of the token.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the default value returned by this function, unless it's overridden. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

getCurrentPrice().details: Calculates the price based on the bonding curve's virtual and real reserves.

returns._0: The current price of one token in USDC (with 6 decimals for USDC).

getLiquiditySupply().details: This determines how much of the total supply is allocated to liquidity vs creator reserve.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

nonces(address).details: Returns the current nonce for `owner`. This value must be included whenever a signature is generated for {permit}. Every successful call to {permit} increases ``owner``'s nonce by one. This prevents a signature from being used multiple times.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Sets `value` as the allowance of `spender` over ``owner``'s tokens, given ``owner``'s signed approval. IMPORTANT: The same issues {IERC20-approve} has related to transaction ordering also apply here. Emits an {Approval} event. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `deadline` must be a timestamp in the future. - `v`, `r` and `s` must be a valid `secp256k1` signature from `owner` over the EIP712-formatted function arguments. - the signature must use ``owner``'s current nonce (see {nonces}). For more information on the signature format, see the https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2612#specification[relevant EIP section]. CAUTION: See Security Considerations above.

sell(uint256,uint256).details: This function is the main entry point for selling tokens.

params.minUsdcOut: The minimum amount of USDC the user is willing to accept.
params.tokensIn: The amount of tokens to sell.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

totalSupply().details: Returns the value of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `value`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Skips emitting an {Approval} event indicating an allowance update. This is not required by the ERC. See {xref-ERC20-_approve-address-address-uint256-bool-}[_approve]. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `value`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `value`.

buy(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC (standard approval required).

buyWithPermit(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Allows a user to buy tokens with USDC using permit (gasless signature).

calculateTokensOut(uint256).notice: Calculate the amount of tokens received for a given USDC input.

calculateUsdcIn(uint256).notice: Calculate the amount of USDC needed to buy a specific amount of tokens.

calculateUsdcOut(uint256).notice: Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.

calculateUsdcOutWithFee(uint256).notice: Calculate the amount of USDC received when selling a specific amount of tokens.

getBondingCurveMaxSupply().notice: Get bonding curve supply (excludes creator reserve)

getCurrentPrice().notice: Get the current token price in USDC.

getLiquiditySupply().notice: Get the liquidity supply for the bonding curve.

getTotalMaxSupply().notice: Get total supply including creator reserve

sell(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a user to sell tokens for USDC.
